alert.note: Alert for Adams (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 7:57PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana and southwestern Adams Counties through 830 PM CST... At 757 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Black Hawk, or 14 miles east of Bordelonville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Slocum around 805 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern Louisiana...and southwestern Mississippi.
